docs.lead_paragraph: The announcement of Lord RAGLAN'S death, by dysentery, on the 28th June, after a week's illness, has fallen upon us most unexpectedly. The London newspapers, received by the Arago yesterday, are unanimous in the expression of sorrow at this conclusion of the veteran's long career.

headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE; ARRIVAL OF THE ARAGO. DEATH OF LORD RAGLAN, AFFAIRS IN THE CRIMEA UNCHANGED. Details of the Attack on the Malakoff and Redan. KERTCH DESTROYED BY FIRE. OPERATIONS IN THE BALTIC. DISTURBANCE IN LONDON. The Sunday Trading Bill Withdrawn. OPENING OF THE FRENCH LEGISLATURE, NAPOLEON'S SPEECH. Interesting from India and China.. The Markets. Consols 91 1-4 to 91 3-8.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U. S. Mail steamship Arago, LINES Commander, from Havre and Cowes, passed the Needles (Cowes) at 1 A. M. July 5, and arrived 12 M. on the 14th July, in 11 days 11 hours. She experienced almost constant westerly winds, and on 11th July a violent westerly gale. She brings 126 passengers and 450 tons French and Swiss Goods. .
docs.abstract: Address at the opening of the Legislative Assembly

docs.lead_paragraph: We have, heretofore, expressed the opinion that so important a branch of the City Government as that of street cleaning, upon which in a great measure the health and prosperity of the City depend, ought not to be entrusted to contractors, but should be under the direct management of the municipal authority;

headline.main: Letter from New. Hampshire--Taveling Facilities, & c.

docs.lead_paragraph: "My foot is on my native heath," and my heart leaps exultant in the presence of these granite hills. No wonder the natives of mountainous regions are distinguished for their love of country. I never could feel at home where there is no hill nor mountain to vary the line of the horizon. and where no river nor bubbling brook sings to me its sweet melody.

headline.main: Later from Havana--Arrival of the Cabawba..

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamship Cahawba, R. W. SHUFELDT, Commander, fron New-Orleans the 8th and Havana the 11th, arrived here this afternoon, four days and fifteen hours fron Havana. The political news from the Island of Cuba is unimportant. The disarming the "Negro Militia"

docs.lead_paragraph: Abridged from the Philedeiphia Commercial List. It seems a general law, that every great civilizing manufacturing interest must undergo a series of reverses, before it attains a permanent and profitable station. What interest has escaped ? Among all, to no one is the remark more applicable than to the manufacture of Iron.
